name: Dawn of the Dog
description:
A short adventure game, made for the Dogpitjam. Inspired by the movie Dawn of the Dead, you get to control a dog and save people from zombies in a mall. It's about a minute of gameplay.

Unfortunately I encountered a bug which I wasn't able to fix in time. The screen flickers on start. If you move the character the flickering stops. My apologies.

Controls are left mouse button to interact with objects. D or right arrow to move forward, A or left arrow to move backwards. 

Made by Remy Smit. Follow me on twitter for more games.

Music by Eric Matyas. Soundimage.org.

Have fun!
